data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dostal, Alexander (2011): Taxonomic remarks about Semiclivina (Kult, 1947) new status, with description of Uroclivina subgen. n., and of two new species from South America (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Scaritinae, Clivinini). ZooKeys 132: 33-50, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.132.1508, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.132.1508
